column6: The X-Men are one issue away from 200...and let's hope Cable and Rogue can make it! Facing a nearly indestructible enemy, both Cable and Rogue will need to make choices that will alter their lives forever.
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | writer:Mike Carey | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Tim Townsend
